content.rendered:
As we look to fall 2021 and beyond, it’s clear that—even as colleges reopen—virtual recruiting is here to stay.

The latest Handshake Network Trends report—Who Wins with Virtual Recruiting?—examines survey results from employers, higher education professionals, and student job seekers to assess their views on virtual career events. Overall, we learned that virtual is not just about convenience; it’s also about equity and access for students.

In this webinar, Christine Cruzvergara hosts a panel with leaders from AT&T, The University of Texas at San Antonio, and Stony Brook University to discuss to the report findings and share strategies that resonate with early career talent.

Check out the full Handshake Network Trends report here.

excerpt.rendered: In this webinar, leaders from AT&T, The University of Texas at San Antonio, and Stony Brook University discuss virtual recruiting and its impact on equity and access.
